thread.title: INSZoom Announces Its Annual Immigration Conference in Bengaluru
thread.title_full: INSZoom Announces Its Annual Immigration Conference in Bengaluru - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: INSZoom Announces Its Annual Immigration Conference in Bengaluru
text:
INSZoom announces its annual conference in Bengaluru, India to be held at the Zuri Hotel. The conference will take place on October 27th and 28th, 2015.
San Ramon, CA (PRWEB) September 18, 2015
INSZoom.com, Inc., the world’s leading immigration software company, announces that its 9th annual Immigration Conference will be held in Bangalore, India, on October 28, 2015.
The INSZoom Immigration Conference is the leading international event for immigration professionals and brings together thought leaders, games changers and the brightest minds in the world of immigration to help define the future of the industry. In 2014, more than 200 immigration and human resources professionals attended the conference to discuss the ever-evolving world of global immigration.
“The INSZoom Immigration Conference is a platform we developed to bring together key opinion leaders and immigration and HR professionals to discuss and help shape global business immigration,” said Umesh Vaidyamath, founder and CEO of INSZoom. “It’s an event that promotes open discussions, active networking and thought-provoking keynotes and we look forward to engaging with this year’s attendees.”
Topics at the INSZoom Immigration Conference include U.S. inbound immigration, immigration policies and tax implications, global business immigration, new trending areas for immigration and more, all with a focus on industry best practices. In 2014, speakers included leaders from Fragomen, Fakhoury Law Group, LawQuest, NASSCOM, Infosys, Mindtree, IBM, SAP, and Consular officers from the US consulate office in Chennai.
“I have attended the INSZoom Immigration Conference for five years and each year I find it to be extremely useful,” said return guest speaker Pankaj Bhatia of Honeywell. “The panel of speakers offer great insight in the latest developments in the field of immigration. There is so much knowledge and best practice sharing at the conference. It also provides a great opportunity to network with fellow professionals in the mobility domain.”
Each year a conference attendee is presented with the Excellence Award, based on his or her accomplishments in the immigration community. Last year, Rami Fakhoury, founder and owner of Fakhoury Law Group, received the Excellence Award for his firm's contributions to and support of Indian immigration.
Don't miss your chance to learn from the best and brightest in the immigration and human resources fields at the 9th annual INSZoom Immigration Conference. For more information and to register for the INSZoom Immigration Conference, visit http://iic2015.inszoom.com .
About INSZoom.com, Inc.: INSZoom is the world's leading immigration case management and compliance company. Founded in 1999, the company has grown and earned the trust of clients that include many of the world's leading corporations, immigration law firms, universities and nonprofit organizations. INSZoom helps its clients improve productivity and efficiency, and ensure compliance. It is a leader within the immigration industry in technological innovation and provides world-class customer support. INSZoom is headquartered in San Ramon, California, with additional offices in London, U.K., and Bengaluru, India.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12970832.htm
